projects.name: Seaside Pavilion
projects.shortDescription: Award-winning temporary pavilion exploring themes of impermanence
projects.fullDescription: A temporary beach pavilion constructed from sustainable materials that responds to tidal patterns and changes throughout the day. Winner of the National Architecture Prize for Temporary Structures.

projects.name: Hillside Residence
projects.shortDescription: Private residence embedded into challenging hillside terrain
projects.fullDescription: A family home designed to respect and integrate with a steep hillside site. Uses passive solar principles and sustainable materials throughout.

projects.name: City Library Renovation
projects.shortDescription: Modernization of historic central library with preservation of heritage elements
projects.fullDescription: A careful renovation that brought modern functionality to a century-old civic building while preserving its historic character and significance.

projects.name: Micro-Apartment Complex
projects.shortDescription: Innovative housing solution for urban density
projects.fullDescription: A residential building featuring innovative micro-apartments with transformable spaces, addressing urban housing shortages while maintaining quality of life.
